article_title: Half of the nation's hospitals, including most in St. Louis, face Medicare readmission penalties
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: Jordan Rau Kaiser Health News

og.description: The fines, in their fourth year, are assessed on hospitals that have patients frequently return and will cost nearly 2,600 hospitals $420M in total
